Name: Gdj
Title: Ram mandir ujjain
Review: Lord ram mata seeta lakshma and hanuman murties at there. Near to harsiddhi temple.peaceful place. Not more crowded.

Name: Sivakumar V
Title: A peaceful serene temple
Review: Amidst the better known Mahakaleshwar & Harsiddhi  is this beautiful temple dedicated Lord Ram. He give Dharshan with Janaki ( Sita ) & Lakshman with Hanuman seeated at their feet bowing down. There are shrines for Shiva and Kali also here. Situated on the banks of the river Shirpa, it is said to have the oldest of Ghats. Harthi to river is said to be performed everyday.A very calm and peaceful atmosphere prevailed when we visited this place. Reasonably kept well.

Name: Gdj
Title: Ram mandir ujjain
Review: This mandir is near to harsiddhi temple. Situated on bank of shipra river ramghay.large space temple.

Name: Himanshu Bhatt
Title: Small temple dedicated to Lord Rama
Review: Its a very small temple dedicated to lord Ram. only few peoples visited this place not very famous but situated at cool place.

Name: rathod2017
Title: Ram Mandir
Review: Ram Mandir as the name suggests is dedicated to Lord Rama who is seen here with his wife Sita on one side and his brother Laxman on another. the architecture of this temple is marvellous.

Name: Karpagavalli
Title: One more temple in the city
Review: The temple is one of several temples along the gusta dedicated to lord ram and since it's not that much crowded can have a quick visit.

Name: meenakshimuthusamy
Title: Ram temple
Review: The temple has got a famous in the city.The place is nice to visit.The place has got a good feel after the visit.

Name: ARUN
Title: BEAUTIFUL AND PEACEFUL HISTORICAL TEMPLE
Review: If u are planning to visit ujjain you must visit this temple. Such a nice and beautiful place with nearby lake "vishnu sagar" where u can enjoy boating. two temples of lord ram(statues are in walking posture) and lord vishnu is there. no so many stairs. Dont miss if ju are in ujjain...............

Name: akankshacoolgirl
Title: Religious Place
Review: Ram Mandir is a famous ram temple in the city of temples ujjain.The temple has a lot of stairs so plan accordingly.

Name: Bimal0401
Title: Jai Shri Ram
Review: The temple of Lord Rama and Janaki is very neat and clean. The atmosphere is very peaceful and pious. It is recommended to visit this temple when at Ujjain, a city of temples.

Name: parmanand06
Title: ram mandir
Review: Ujjain is the city of temple, This temple is for lord ram.Both the-Ram Janki temple and Vishnu Janardan temples in Ram Janardan temple.This is very old temple .Beautiful paintings,art.

Name: vinsach
Title: Ram Mandir
Review: nice religious place, must visit with anyone ,family, friends. very peaceful and calming place. one must definitely go.

Name: yogindery
Title: Ram Mandir
Review: ujjain city is very holy and 'historical' city in india. if called temple nagari no doubt.Ram Mandir is one of them near to shipra river ram ghat also a sightseeing place in ujjain.

Name: perplexed_soul
Title: Small and calm temple
Review: Idols of Lord Rama, Sita and Laksmana are there in this small temple. Need to climb lot of stairs to reach to the top. One of the many good places to visit in Ujjain.

Name: rahulkumar1411
Title: ram mandir
Review: one of the beautiful temple surrounded by few more small shrine nearby.i found this place good for meditation.

Name: law_madhulika
Title: Ujjain is the city of Temple
Review: Ujjain is the city of temple. Its a holy place. this is a temple on Ram sita and Lakshman. you will also get to worship hanuman here as one of the bhakt of shri ram.

Name: Vikas Singh
Title: Ram Janardan temple
Review: Both the-Ram Janki temple and Vishnu Janardan temples in Ram Janardan temple complex were built by Mirza Raja Jai Singh in the 17th century. What makes the idol of Ram unique is the fact that Ram is shown with a beard. The boundary wall and the tank nearby were added by the Marathas in the 18th century. Beautiful paintings from the Maratha period depicting scenes from Ramayana can be seen in the garbha griha. The sculpture of Sheshasayi Vishnu installed between the assembly hall and the garbha griha of Ram Janki temple belongs to the 10th century while that of Bramha, Vishnu and Mahesh belongs to the 12th century AD.

Name: JAGDISH RAVAL
Title: A small Temple
Review: Ram Mandir is at Ram mandir Ghat at bank of River Shipra. Here is temple of Lord Rama. There are idols of Ram,Laxman & Jnaki along with Hanumanaji. A small temple.

Name: Anshuman A
Title: Temples
Review: Seoni is located between Jabalpur and Nagpur.  In the middle of crossing various small villages with unknown names, you will suddenly find Seoni with great religious activities.   The city has Jain Temples of Shwetambar and Digambar sects, Hanuman Temple besides the Ram Temple which is very famous.    There is also a lake by the name of Dal Sagar Lake in the town. The place is famous for Peda of a special type.

Name: vinodkhedkar
Title: Ram Temple
Review: This is a hundred year old temple which was reconstructed in the year 1974.This temple has number of steps to climb.This is a temple where idol Lord Ram,Sita and Laxman is been worshiped.
